name: time-series-collection
description: A tiny, blazing-fast time series collection library with zero dependencies (did I get that right?)
author: Daniel Leone

scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run test && npm run build && git commit -am "auto-prettier" && git push
scripts.publish-patch: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run test && npm run build && git commit -am "auto-prettier" && git push && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
